dcterms:creator: Emily Dinan
Samuel Humeau
Bharath Chintagunta
Jason Weston
dcterms:description: A single-turn conversational dataset where crowdworkers were asked to construct sentences that they would consider offensive.
dcterms:title: ParlAI Single Standard

dcterms:creator: Emily Dinan
Samuel Humeau
Bharath Chintagunta
Jason Weston
dcterms:description: A single-turn conversational dataset built by asking crowdworkers to submit sentences that are offensive but predicted to be safe by a classifier.
dcterms:title: ParlAI Single Adversarial

dcterms:creator: Emily Dinan
Samuel Humeau
Bharath Chintagunta
Jason Weston
dcterms:description: A multi-turn conversational dataset consisting of sequences representing multiple turns of human conversations where the last utterance is meant to be offensive.
dcterms:title: ParlAI Multi

dcterms:creator: Jing Xu
Da Ju
Margaret Li
Y-Lan Boureau
Jason Weston
Emily Dinan
dcterms:description: A collection of dialogues related to conversational toxicity, collected by asking humans to converse with a bot to lead it into generating offensive output.
dcterms:title: Bot Adversarial Dialogue (BAD)

dcterms:creator: Ilan Price
Jordan Gifford-Moore
Jory Flemming
Saul Musker
Maayan Roichman
Guillaume Sylvain
Nithum Thain
Lucas Dixon
Jeffrey Sorensen
dcterms:description: A corpus consisting of comments labeled for healthy and unhealthy attributes, including hostility, antagonism, and sarcasm.
dcterms:title: Unhealthy Comment Corpus (UCC)

dcterms:description: A newly created dataset comprised of human-written texts annotated according to three attributes for chatbot responses to difficult or polarizing questions.
dcterms:title: Neutral Responses
